description: A mysterious mist that appears near Ruluka Island, containing a time-distorted dimension called Ape's Concert where ships and people become trapped.

keyEvents.description: Rapanui sees his father's Marine ship within the mist.
Rainbow Tower creates a bridge into the mist.
Waters inside the mist become turbulent as the Rainbow Tower extends into it.

trivia: The Rainbow Mist creates time displacement - people inside age much slower than the outside world.
Ships trapped inside cannot escape without external intervention.

description: A sub-dimension inside the Rainbow Mist filled with wrecked ships and their treasures. The name is a pun on the Japanese pronunciation of 'Sargasso' sounding like 'saru gassō' (monkey/ape concert).

keyEvents.description: Nami discovers treasure in the ship graveyard section.
The dimensional stability is disrupted by the Rainbow Tower.
Rapanui confronts Henzo about their past.
Wetton's forces invade through the Rainbow Tower bridge.

trivia: The name 'Ape's Concert' is a pun on the Sargasso Sea.
Time flows differently inside - the Pumpkin Pirates remained children for 50 years.
Contains treasures from ships lost over decades.

description: A section of Ape's Concert filled with wrecked ships and their treasure cargo, discovered by Nami in this episode.

keyEvents.description: Nami finds a rowboat full of treasure but realizes escape is more important.

trivia: Contains treasures from multiple time periods.

description: A tower built on Ruluka Island through heavy taxation, designed by Henzo to create a bridge into the Rainbow Mist dimension.

keyEvents.description: Wetton activates the Rainbow Tower, creating a horizontal bridge into the Rainbow Mist.
Serves as a tunnel for Wetton's forces to invade Ape's Concert.

trivia: Built through excessive taxation of Ruluka Island citizens.
Designed by Henzo over decades of research.
Functions as a bridge between dimensions when activated.

description: An island ruled by the dictator mayor Wetton, who over-taxes the people to fund the Rainbow Tower construction.

keyEvents.description: Rainbow Tower is activated from Ruluka Island.
Lake electrocutes Sanji on the island.

trivia: Was burned down by Wetton 50 years ago during his pirate days.
Suffers from excessive taxation to fund the Rainbow Tower.
The Rainbow Mist appears periodically near the island.

description: The wreckage of a Marine ship inside the Rainbow Mist where Ian was imprisoned.

keyEvents.description: Ian is held in a cell here before tricking Akibi into releasing him.
Rapanui sees his father's Marine ship, likely this or a similar wreckage.

trivia: Rapanui's father may have been aboard a similar Marine ship.
